# Tsala Quilting Studio

## About
Tsala Quilting Studio is an idealistic hub located in the heart of Bengaluru for all Quilting & Hobby enthusiasts. We offer workshops, classes, and a shop for quilting supplies.

## Services & Classes
- **Quilting**: Learn the art of quilting from basics to advanced techniques.
- **Sewing**: Tailoring and stitching classes for all levels.
- **Bag Making**: Specialized courses in creating handmade bags.
- **Longarm Quilting**: Professional longarm services for your quilt tops.
- **Other Crafts**: Knitting, Crochet, Decoupage, and more.

## Location
Bengaluru, India.

## Contact
- **Phone**: 9880162266
- **Website**: https://www.tsalastudio.com
- **Shop**: https://www.tsalastudio.com/shop

## Blog
Visit our blog at https://www.tsalastudio.com/blog for tips, tutorials, and stories.
